entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
